commitResults.messageBody:
The bot now echos what the user types.
If 'bye' is typed, the bot will exit.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to Add and List task
commitResults.messageBody:
The bot now have the ability to read user inputs and store them as task.
The bot also have the ability to list user task if the user types 'list'.

Task.java is a class added to handle objects related to a Task.
Duke.java is updated to use the methods listed in Task.java.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update code to comply with coding standards

commitResults.messageBody:
New commands added:
todo: add a todo task to list. Example: todo borrow book
event: add an event to list. Example: event project meeting /from 2pm /to 4pm
deadline: add a deadline to list. Example: deadline join sports club /by Feb 1st

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor code and improve code quality
